tool.name: QCEmbedder
tool.description: Attaches a table or an image to a given qc parameter
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing #if $in: mkdir in && cp '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && #end if #if $run: mkdir run && cp '$run' 'run/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $run.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($run.ext)' && #end if #if $plot: mkdir plot && cp '$plot' 'plot/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $plot.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($plot.ext)' && #end if #if $table: mkdir table && cp '$table' 'table/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $table.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($table.ext)' && #end if mkdir out &&
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd #if $in: -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' #end if #if $run: -run 'run/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $run.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($run.ext)' #end if #if $plot: -plot 'plot/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $plot.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($plot.ext)' #end if #if $table: -table 'table/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $table.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($table.ext)' #end if -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("qcml")}'
## Postprocessing && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("qcml")}' '$out' #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.label: Defines the qp cv accession of the qp to which the table/image is attached
Defines the cv accession of the attachment
The file that defined the run under which the qp for the attachment is aggregated as mzML file
param.help: The file is only used to extract the run name from the file name select mzml data sets(s)

param.label: If no file for the run was given (or if the target qp is contained in a set), at least a name of the target run/set containing the the qp for the attachment has to be given
If a plot image is to be attached to a qp, this has to be specified here
If a table is to be attached to a qp, this has to be specified here
Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Attaches a table or an image to a given qc parameter.
For more information, visit https://openms.de/doxygen/release/3.2.0/html/TOPP_QCEmbedder.html
